channel.name: Reformat Report
channel.description:
This channel shows how one can reformat a report which has long lines into shorter lines.
This can be necessary in order to take textual data from one system and display it within another which has more strict text width limitations.
-- This example shows how we can achieve a maximum of N characters per line. -- The goal is to split text into lines of equal length to make it easier to -- display in a downstream system.
http://help.interfaceware.com/v6/reformat-report

to_mapper.commit_comment: updated to return single function from string.formatText module
